byline.contributor: Mike Soraghan reported from Raleigh, and Eli Rosenberg from New York. Richard Pérez-Peña contributed reporting from New York.
byline.original: By MIKE SORAGHAN and ELI ROSENBERG

abstract: About 200 people gather for vigil in Raleigh, NC, to honor Akiel Denkins, 24-year-old black man shot dead by Police Officer D C Twiddy.
lead_paragraph: A crowd in Raleigh gathered at the scene of the shooting, which neighbors said killed Akiel Denkins, 24, with some people yelling at officers.

headline.main: Officer in North Carolina Fatally Shoots Black Man During Chase
headline.print_headline: Mourners in North Carolina Denounce Killing by Officer

snippet: A crowd in Raleigh gathered at the scene of the shooting, which neighbors said killed Akiel Denkins, 24, with some people yelling at officers.
